Description: The Flight into Egypt; the Virgin carrying the Child, Joseph with the donkey, an angel above leading the way, another angel in a boat to right, trees and part of a landscape with buildings behind Pen and brown ink, grey wash, heightened with white, over black chalk
Curator's comments: Traditionally given to Lazzaro Baldi, the attribution to Nasini is due to Philip Pouncey (his inscription on mount 'Nasini surely !'). Not in Phillipps-Fenwick.
